name: Job Hunt Tracker Notion Template
description: Welcome to our Job Hunt Tracker Notion Template!Weâ€™ve designed this Job Hunt Tracker Template to include everything you might need when you want to manage your job applications in Notion. The template is designed with a minimalist color style so that it can help you get more focused on preparing applications.Our Job Hunt Tracker Template at a Glance:Companies: where you record companies you are interested inContacts: where you store all potential contacts related to the recruiting processProfile
features: Companies: where you record companies you are interested in; Contacts: where you store all potential contacts related to the recruiting process; Profiles & Documents: where you store information related to your profile, certifications, and personal documents. This makes it easier to refer to later on.; Resources: where you keep tips and tricks related to landing the perfect job; Current Resume & Cover Letter: where you can embed your latest versions of your resume and cover letter; Resume & Cover Letter Templates: where you can share your Notion resume online; Applications: where you can manage all of your applications; Calendars & To-Do: where you can have your task list in a calendar view or board view
